Home.title: Challenge Yourself, Master Everything!
Home.description: QuizzA is the perfect app to challenge your mind and level up your knowledge. With a variety of fun quizzes, you can test your skills and master new topics every day. Ready to take on the challenge?

NotFound.title: Not Found
NotFound.description: Sorry, we couldn't find what you're looking for

auth.signoutDescription: Are you sure you want to sign out?
auth.loginDescription: Enter your credentials to sign in to your account
auth.errorEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
auth.errorPassword: Password must be at least 8 characters.
auth.verificationDescription: We've sent a verification link to your email address. Please check your inbox and verify your account.

dashboard.noneQuizDescription: Create your first quiz and engage your audience with interactive questions and instant feedback.
dashboard.createQuizDescription: Create new quiz and engage your audience
dashboard.deleteQuizDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this Quiz? This action cannot be undone.

createQuiz.question: Question
createQuiz.deleteQuestionDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this question? This action cannot be undone.

play.question: Question
play.resultTitle: Learning is a journey. Keep going, and you'll get there.
play.alertTitle: Are you sure you want to submit?
play.alertDescription: Once you submit, you will not be able to change your answers.
